category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: ProgramViewGroupProperties
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of attributes for schedule and schedule task objects displayed in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Valid Values: Schedule Task.complete_percent - Displays complete percent in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.actual_start_date - Displays actual start date in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.actual_finish_date - Displays actual finish date in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.work_complete - Displays work complete in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.ResourceAssignment - Displays resource assignment in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.object_desc - Displays object description in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.duration - Displays duration in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.object_name - Displays object name in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.priority - Displays priority in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.start_date - Displays start date in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.finish_date - Displays finish date in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.work_estimate - Displays work estimate in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.fnd0state - Displays state in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Schedule Task.fnd0status - Displays status in the Grouping dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened.
